data.prayer: Father, help the 52 believers in Aïn Témouchent to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aïn Témouchent, Algeria
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 52 believers in Aïn Témouchent, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 75,542, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Aïn Témouchent.
Spirit, I pray that the Bedouin, Laguat people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, encourage the 52 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 52 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: There are 75,600 people living in the state of Aïn Témouchent. Only about 52 might be believers.
